description: Main entry point of a Flutter application defining UI themes, app structure, and navigation logic for the preference_frontend project.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up the application's theme and provider for the filter state.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Home page widget displaying a basic scaffold with AppBar and navigation to FilterScreen.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns the application's custom theme data with color scheme and styling.

methods.name: _openFilters
methods.description: Handles navigation to the FilterScreen when the filter button is pressed.
